raw_body: Madhuraganan Shanmugananthan (old boy of Royal College co-7, class of “06”) precious son of Shaan and Rohini, beloved brother of Shanghini, fond brother-in-low of Rajen Wijenathan, loved uncle of Aariyen and Rayaan.Precious grandson of Admirthalingam and Sivarooby, Dr. Sabathypillai and Sellamma. Remains will be kept at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour For viwing on 03.01.24 from 8.30 am onwards. Leave thereafter for cremation at 2.00 pm at the General Cemetry Borella. Rajen – 0777 877 393 / Shanghini – 0743 396 385 S Block, 2nd Floor, No. 08, Anderson Flats Colombo 05.
